data.eml:eml: Two new species of Pseudoscopelus (Teleostei: Chiasmodontidae), with a new diagnosis for the genus.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marcelo R. S. Melo, H. J. Walker, Jr., Cynthia Klepadlo (2007): Two new species of Pseudoscopelus (Teleostei: Chiasmodontidae), with a new diagnosis for the genus. Zootaxa 1605: 33-46, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:9562F15A-149A-41A7-9ECC-F2EEC1DD67A1
